column1: Art Institute of Chicago////In between the galleries there was a great little cafe that had Â a charging station
column2: perfect for all those phone batteries that are slowly dying. The cafe also sold ADORABLE ALUMINIUM COCA-COLA BOTTLES! Being a fan of collecting stuff like this
column3: I was pretty psyched when I saw this. They also have diet coke
column5: etc. in aluminum bottles too. However
column6: once you leave the cafe area you have to put all beverages away in a bag (or pocket)
column7: regardless of whether they are capped or not.
